EmailTemplate.textOnly:
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
FOR THE LESSONS THEY DON'T TEACH YOU IN CLASS
Sorry we missed you on NCS this summer.
It's not too late to broaden your horizons and gain new skills this Autumn
Book Now - Places still available on NCS this Autumn half term.
Programmes take place during Autumn half term plus 4 weekend days in November.
For more information visit -
www.ncsthechallenge.org
or call us on
0203 542 2400
Important: before your parent or guardian can log in to choose your dates, you need to go back to the ‘Registration’ part of your account to update your school or college. It needs to be the one you'll be attending in October (if you’ve stayed for sixth form, choose the sixth form option).
Make the most of your half term
Boost your CV / UCAS statement
Build your leadership and communication skills
